short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Mode, read at night. Bluelight filter for every website. Relax your eyes at night and day.
short.fa: حالت تیره، شب ها مطالعه کنید. فیلتر نور آبی برای همه سایت ها. در شب و در روز به چشمانتان استراحت بدهید.
short.tr: Karanlık Mod ile geceleri okuyun.  Her web sitesi için mavi ışık filtresi.  Gece ve gündüz gözlerinizi rahatlatın.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f: Do you want to enjoy a more comfortable and eye-friendly browsing experience? Do you want to switch between light and dark modes with just one click? If yes, then Dark Mode is the extension for you!
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419:
Dark Mode - Enhance Your Browsing Experience

Experience the web in a whole new light with Dark Mode! This powerful browser extension not only transforms your favorite websites into a sleek and stylish dark theme, but it also offers a range of additional functionalities to make your browsing experience even better.

Key Features:

Dark Theme: Enjoy a visually pleasing and comfortable browsing experience by changing the bright backgrounds of websites to a sophisticated dark theme.
Brightness Adjustment: Customize the darkness level according to your preferences. Easily adjust brightness to find the perfect balance for your eyes, day or night.
Contrast Enhancement: Fine-tune the contrast settings to make text and images stand out clearly against the dark background, ensuring optimal readability.
Grayscale Mode: Reduce visual distractions and create a minimalist aesthetic by switching to grayscale mode. This mode can be particularly helpful for increasing focus and reducing eye strain.
BlueLight Filtering: Shield your eyes from the harmful effects of blue light emitted by screens. BlueLight Control applies a gentle and effective filter that reduces blue light, minimizing eye strain and helping you sleep better, especially when browsing during the evening or night.
Customizable Options: Tailor the extension's settings to match your exact preferences. Control various aspects such as darkness intensity, contrast levels, and grayscale settings.
Upgrade your browsing experience with Dark Mode and discover a new way to interact with your favorite websites. Say goodbye to blindingly bright screens and hello to a more elegant, soothing, and customizable online environment.

Transform the web today - install Dark Mode!
